Room.Name: Ituk Igloo
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small, cramped igloo located slightly below the glacier.
Room.LongDescription: Oddly, the igloo you see lies slightly below the plane of the glacier, leading into the massive chunk of ice. There is a heavy, metal door located to the north with a new lock on it. There is no key around that you can see, and the door looks like it's been undisturbed for ages.
